org.lunifera.runtime.utils.paxexam

Class OrbitJUnitBundlesOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ops4j.pax.exam.options.AbstractDelegateProvisionOption<OrbitJUnitBundlesOption>
      • org.lunifera.runtime.utils.paxexam.OrbitJUnitBundlesOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ops4j.pax.exam.Option, org.ops4j.pax.exam.options.ProvisionControl<OrbitJUnitBundlesOption>, org.ops4j.pax.exam.options.ProvisionOption<OrbitJUnitBundlesOption>, org.ops4j.pax.exam.options.UrlReference

    public class OrbitJUnitBundlesOption
extends org.ops4j.pax.exam.options.AbstractDelegateProvisionOption<OrbitJUnitBundlesOption>
    This Option indicate to Pax-exam to use the Junit bundle provided by Eclipse Orbit.

    This is needed in order to use the Hamcrest bundles provided by Eclipse Orbit.

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    cvgaviao
